name: Pet City Mania SkyBattle
description: PCM SB is a third person space combat shooter game with elements of music and rhythm. The main idea is to pilot a ship through various worlds and levels, battling enemy ships, dodging music-controlled obstacles and fixed ones, and defeating a boss at the end of each world. The game is inspired by other games in the genre such as Star Fox. For now,  there's only one level and one playable characters. Your feedback is welcome.
